statements: DELETE FROM waste_collection_hotspots WHERE hotspot_id = 1 AND waste_type = 'Plastic';
DELETE FROM waste_collection_hotspots WHERE address = '123 Main Street'
DELETE FROM interventions WHERE intervention_type = 'Clean-up' AND intervention_cost > 1000
DELETE FROM interventions WHERE intervention_type = 'Cleanup' AND intervention_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM CollectionInterventions WHERE intervention_type = 'Emergency' AND intervention_date < '2022-06-30'
DELETE FROM CollectionInterventions WHERE hotspot_id = 5 AND intervention_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CollectionStats WHERE collection_amount < 1000 AND hotspot_id = 3;
